login_screen.Please verify your email before logging: Please verify your email before logging in

Password.min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
Password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
Password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
Password.number: Password must contain at least one digit.
Password.special: Password must contain at least one special character.

register_screen.invalid_age: Age must be a number between 0 and 999.
register_screen.invalid_height: Height must be a number between 10 and 999.
register_screen.invalid_weight: Weight must be a number between 10 and 999.
register_screen.invalid_phone: Phone number must be exactly 10 digits.

Water_screen.You have completed your daily water sche: You have completed your daily water schedule!

Articles.Stretch to Reduce Pain Desc: Alleviate discomfort in your upper body, lower body, and core with these miracle moves.
Articles.Guide to Good Posture Desc: Good posture is about more than standing up straight.
Articles.Preventing Office Syndrome While WFH Des: Office Syndrome is a group of symptoms caused by sitting or remaining in the same position for long periods of time.
Articles.Why Move More? Desc: Health benefits of standing up and walking during work.
